protein.specific_function: Proton-coupled chloride transporter. Functions as antiport system and exchanges chloride ions against protons. Important for normal acidification of the endosome lumen. May play an important role in renal tubular function.

reference.reference_text: Fisher SE, van Bakel I, Lloyd SE, Pearce SH, Thakker RV, Craig IW: Cloning and characterization of CLCN5, the human kidney chloride channel gene implicated in Dent disease (an X-linked hereditary nephrolithiasis). Genomics. 1995 Oct 10;29(3):598-606.
